basic_info.name: Guntur Medical College Admissions
description: GMC offers a variety of courses under its on-campus facilities with various specialities including UG, PG and Diploma programmes, each having their own selection criteria. GMC Admissions to any of the programmes requires either an entrance test to qualify or clear the merit-based selection process.
How to Apply for GMC Admissions?

According to the programme selected, required scores of entrance exams need to be filled like, NEET UG for UG programmes, NEET-PG for PG programmes like MD, MS. While for courses like M Ch, NEET SS scores are required.
Read more: Guntur Medical College Admissions

basic_info.name: Guntur Medical College Facilities
description: GMC has modern lab equipment to meet the requirement as per the era to develop and meet the research facilities, medical advancements. Following are the facilities provided to students and staff on the GMC campus.

GMC college library has 28,000 books and subscribes to more than 100 journals including access to another 100 E-Journals. GMC has an ultra-modern air-conditioned auditorium, which was built with contributions from GMCANA. GMC has the latest demonstration rooms fitted with overhead projectors and audio-visual equipment and seating capacity for 900. As it plays an important role in the medical hospital to teach the students with visual graphics.

basic_info.name: Guntur Medical College Faculty
description: Guntur Medical College has a wonderful teaching and non-teaching staff that continuously strives towards the betterment of its students and in addition the health of the society by imparting good quality education and work ethics. They are totally responsible for providing high-quality education to future professionals, and the academic portfolio of such faculties are no less than extraordinary.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the review on placements regarding post the MBBS from GMC?
faqs.answer: Ans.As per the medical colleges’ policy, a year of internship is compulsory post-MBBS which in turn might convert to a full-time job opportunity. Meanwhile, placement scenarios are on an average rate at GMC.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the expected fees for MBBS at GMC?
faqs.answer: Ans.An annual fee at GMC is quite affordable at the rate of INR 10,500. For more information,click here.

faqs.question: Ques. Are there any recreational activities involved at the campus for students?
faqs.answer: Ans.There are several committees formed to enhance students’ extra-curricular activities.

faqs.question: Ques. How to reach the campus most effectively?
faqs.answer: Ans.GMC is located within a city as 2.8 km from the city centre and can be reached by local means of transport, such as city buses, auto-rickshaws, taxis and minibuses, accessible 24 hours. Guntur Railway Junction is one of the state's main railway stations and located 1 km from college.

Section.name: About Guntur Medical College
Section.description:
Guntur Medical College is one of the premier medical institutions in south India. It is located in the heart of the city of Guntur, the knowledge hub of Andhra Pradesh. This Institute was established in 1946, it is accredited by AICTE and is affiliated to Dr NTR University of Health Sciences, Vijayawada (NTRUHS).
GMC, Guntur Medical College offers undergraduate courses with an annual intake of about 200 students and various medical Specialities including non-clinical, Para clinical and Clinical branches, which in total offers 47 courses across 4 streams namely Medical, Pharmacy, Paramedical, Science and across 6 degrees like MBBS, BSc, MD, MS (Surgery), MCh.
4.1 How to Apply for GMC Admissions?
GMC is considered to be a great asset to the country as it provides high-class facilities like it has the ultra-modern air-conditioned auditorium, which was built with contributions from GMCANA. It has the latest audiovisual equipment and seating capacity for 900. A new super speciality complex Podila Prasad, GMCANA Super speciality and Trauma Centre, with state of the art facilities. GMC has been accredited to 55th position in Medical colleges around India.
GMC is rich in providing excellent academics to their students via their top-class faculties, who themselves are awardee of prestigious awards and have tremendous achievements with them. Almost each and every department at GMC is capable and has acquired various nominations, along with awards such as awards in poster presentations and conferences. Some of them are tabulated below:

Guntur Medical College Awards & Achievem.Award / Achievement: Participated as Chairperson in National CME & Conference on Atomic Neurosciences Workshop in GIMS, Gadag, Karnataka
Appointed as Editor in Chief for the Journal of DR.NTRUHS, Vijayawada
Guntur Medical College Awards & Achievem.Awardee: Dr C Padmavathi Devi Professor & HOD

Guntur Medical College Awards & Achievem.Award / Achievement: Awarded – Vyaghreswarudu Gold Medal for consultants in OSSAPCON held at Vijayawada
Gold Medal for best Poster for TB otitis Media – A rare entity in AOIPACON Annual State Conference held at Ananthapuram
Awarded 1st Prize for Poster presentation on A case report of lipoid proteinosis at CUTICON at Vijayawada
Got 1st prize for best Paper presentation in APTCCON – Prevalence of Genetic pattern in INH Resistant TB cases and its association with other TB drug resistance
1st Prize in paper presentation in State conference held at Amalapuram on 18th, 19th & 20th October
Second Topper of the university in M Ch (Urology) examination conducted by Dr.NTR university of health sciences, Vijayawada by securing second highest marks in the exam
Received Associate fellowship from Andhra Pradesh Academy of Sciences, Amaravathi

Guntur Medical College Courses.Eligibility: MBBS or Bachelor’s Degree in relevant discipline
